nodes.title: Join Us for the Florida Detox and Wellbeing Fair
nodes.excerpt: The World Council for Health Florida is thrilled to invite YOU to the Detox & Wellbeing Fair! Whether you’re curious about wellness or looking for ways to improve your health, this is the perfect opportunity to explore, learn, and connect—all while enjoying the beautiful Grand Oaks Resort! nodes.title: Could This Be the End of Covid-19 Vaccines in Australia?
nodes.excerpt: Julian Gillespie and Councillor Adrian McRae of Port Hedland Council, Western Australia (WA), convened a critical Special Meeting of Council to discuss further action and the recent Letters of Russel Broadbent MP to Prime Minister, the Science Summary, and Dr David Speicher’s DNA contamination report. For more information on this exciting development which could be […]

nodes.title: Andy Wakefield’s “Protocol 7” Film: Additional UK Screenings Released
nodes.excerpt: Following the first-ever UK screening of this important film in September, WCH is delighted to release additional screenings: You can learn more about “Protocol 7” which is based on real life events at: https://worldcouncilforhealth.substack.com/p/a-decades-long-vaccine-scandal-finally

nodes.title: What Broke the Netherlands Birth Rate?
nodes.excerpt: What had been a steady downward trend accelerated in early 2022. Why? Dr Maarten Fornerod According to new data from Statistics Netherlands (CBS), there is a continuing downward trend in births per 100,000 inhabitants. This trend has been steady since 2010, but a graph of the last ten years shows a clear trend break from the beginning […]

node.altText: What Broke the Netherlands Birth Rate?

nodes.title: World Council for Health Responds to Latest Bird Flu Developments
nodes.excerpt: According to the United States Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the largest outbreak of bird flu ever recorded is currently underway. Avian Influenza, or bird flu, has reportedly been detected in more than 9,000 wild birds and more than 90 million poultry have been affected in the United States alone. Outbreaks have been […]

nodes.title: Slovakia’s PM Who Spoke Out Against the WHO Has Been Shot
nodes.excerpt: The World Council for Health wishes to express deep concern at the news of the attempted assassination of Slovakia’s Prime Minister Robert Fico, who was shot multiple times while greeting supporters on 15 May 2024 in the Slovakian town of Handlová.  The assailant, 71-year-old activist poet Juraj Cintula, had been openly critical of Fico’s opposition […]

nodes.title: World Council for Health Serves WHO Employees with Notice of Liability Ahead of World Health Assembly 77
nodes.excerpt: World Council for Health Estonia anchored an informative civil society-led parliamentary meeting and press conference in Estonia on Monday the 6th of May. The conference focused on World Health Organization (WHO) negotiations and the EU Health and Climate Policy. It precedes the WHO’s controversial World Health Assembly 77 vote on the International Health Regulations 2005 […]

nodes.title: Cancelled Panel of Scientists to Speak at UN Human Rights Council Meeting on Health and Human Rights During Covid to Hold Press Conference in Geneva
nodes.excerpt: Press Conference: March 22, 2024 at 14h00 CETLocation: Central Geneva, address upon registrationLivestream link: https://worldcouncilforhealth.org/newsroom/Press Contact: Nic Robinson at nic@worldcouncilforhealth.org.   A panel of international scientists invited to attend a UN HRC side meeting during the 55th Regular Session on Human Rights has been cancelled at short notice. nodes.title: PRINCIPLE Trial Fails to Refute Evidence of Ivermectin’s Efficacy in Covid-19
nodes.excerpt: Results from the Oxford-managed PRINCIPLE trial of ivermectin in out-patient Covid-19 were published in the Journal of Infection on 29 February 2024, over a year and half after the trial’s closure in July 2022, and over 2 years since the originally planned termination. The unexpected pause in January 2022 (said to be due to supply […]

nodes.title: The World Council for Health Strongly Opposes France’s Draconian New Law Criminalizing Medical Dissent
nodes.excerpt: On 14th February 2024, the French Parliament adopted amendments to an existing anti-cult law. The measures voted in by parliamentarians include the highly controversial Article 4 criminalizing medical dissent by criminalizing any individual criticizing or encouraging others to avoid mainstream medical practices or health policies, assuming such avoidance can be claimed by authorities to do […]

nodes.title: World Council for Health Invites the CPSO to Save Its Credibility and Reverse Its Decision to Revoke Dr Mark Trozzi’s Medical License
nodes.excerpt: Losing a medical license for ‘misinformation’ is now a chief indicator of integrity On 25 January 2024, The College of Physicians and Surgeons of Ontario (CPSO) revoked Dr Mark Trozzi’s medical license, dealing a fatal blow to its credibility as a regulatory body.  This penalty decision followed the CPSO’s October ruling that Dr Trozzi was […]

nodes.title: UK Parliament to Debate ‘Excess Deaths’ This Week
nodes.excerpt: On 16 January 2024, there is a Parliamentary Debate in the UK House of Commons on the increase in Excess Deaths experienced in the UK since the rollout of the Covid-19 ‘vaccines.’  The UK MP, Mr Andrew Bridgen, who called for the debate and who is due to lead it has previously stated about the […]
